appendix.title: The MINIX Source Code
appendix.para:
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ include/ansi.h ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00001 * conformance to Standard C for Minix to take advantage of. If so, the 00002 * symbol _ANSI is defined (as 31459). Otherwise _ANSI is not defined 00003 * here, but it may be defined by applications that want to bend the rules. 00004 * The magic number in the definition is to inhibit unnecessary bending 00005 * of the rules. (For consistency with the new '#ifdef _ANSI" tests in 00006 * the headers, _ANSI should really be defined as nothing, but that would 00007 * break many library routines that use "#if _ANSI".)
